title: Kaishain x Sumida Suizokukan Bikkuri! Kai Matsuri CM
original_name: 貝社員 × すみだ水族館　ビックリ！貝まつり CM
sinopse: A Kaishain promotion for the Sumida Aquarium featuring a exhibit that has the species of animals the Kaishain characters are modeled after: clione, octopus, and various shellfish. The exhibit will run from Saturday, March 18, 2017 - Sunday May 7, 2017.
